h2_title: Black Myth: Wukong Snow Fox Brush Location
content: To get the Snow Fox Brush, you need to complete the Snow Fox questline in The New West. Then in the Forest of Felicity in the Valley of Ecstasy in The New West, you need to obtain the fox form from the body near to the Shrine.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Snow_Fox_Brush.md', within the main section titled 'Snow Fox Brush', specifically from the subsection 'Black Myth: Wukong Snow Fox Brush Location'.
The content is as follows:
To get the Snow Fox Brush, you need to complete the Snow Fox questline in The New West. Then in the Forest of Felicity in the Valley of Ecstasy in The New West, you need to obtain the fox form from the body near to the Shrine.
